input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "PicturesOnGold"
Reference Product Name: "Heart Photo Pendant/Charm"
Reference Product Description:
Photo Color Laser Or Photo Laser Engraving is scratch and water resistant and included in the price.
How will you send your photos:
Upload right through the website, E-mail, or Mail in.
Click "Customize & Add to Cart" button to choose how would you like to send your photos

Please Note: Message Engraving & Chain are optional and are not included.
Perfect for a Charm or as a pendant. Request a special clasp to easily attach to your charm bracelet Free of Charge.
Item can be engraved with message, names, dates or monogram.
Engraving doesn't delay your shipment.
Picture Engraving is scratch and water resistant and included in the price.
Available in Three Sizes in Solid 14K, Gold Plated,Yellow, White, Or Sterling Silver
What Shape is This Item? Heart
Is a Chain Included? You can choose which chain to add to your order when checking out

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Shutterfly Engraved Oval Locket Necklace Best Ever'
  - Name='Shutterfly Heart Monogram Flat Glass Prints'
  - Name='Shutterfly Monogram Trio Oval Locket Necklace'
  - Name='18K Gold Filled Personalized Heart Locket Necklace'
  - Name='Gold & Silver Engraved Heart Photo Locket Necklace'
  - Name='Custom Photo Heart Photo Necklace'
  - Name='Zales Sterling Silver Tilted Heart Locket'
  - Name='Gold Heart Necklace Locket with Photos'
  - Name='Zales 10K Gold Engravable Photo Rope Frame Pendant'
  - Name='Things Remembered Silver Beaded Oval Locket Ornament'
  - Name='Personalized Sterling Silver Photo Heart Necklace'
  - Name='Tiny Poppy Heart Photo Locket Necklace'
  - Name='Forget Me Not Heart Photo Locket Necklace'
  - Name='18K Gold Vermeil Heart Photo Locket'
  - Name='Personalized Photo Birthstone Pendant'
  - Name='Vintage Heart Locket Necklace'
  - Name='Small Rectangle Photo Charm Necklace 10K'
  - Name='Floral Heart Locket Necklace in Yellow Gold'
  - Name='Sterling Silver Cubic Zirconia Floral Heart Photo Locket Necklace'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Shutterfly Engraved Oval Locket Necklace Best Ever
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a photo locket necklace with engraving, similar in function, but oval shaped instead of heart shaped; differs in silhouette but similar usage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Shutterfly Heart Monogram Flat Glass Prints
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Heart-shaped but a flat glass print product, not a pendant or charm with engraving, and lacks locket or 3D construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Shutterfly Monogram Trio Oval Locket Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Oval lockets for photos and monograms; similar personalization but different shape and possibly lacks charm functionality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 18K Gold Filled Personalized Heart Locket Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Heart-shaped personalized locket necklace closely matches the shape, personalization, and materials of reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gold & Silver Engraved Heart Photo Locket Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Gold/silver engraved heart photo locket necklace perfectly matches the reference in shape, personalization, and materials.
Heart-shaped photo necklace custom made with photos, very similar function and style to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zales Sterling Silver Tilted Heart Locket
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Heart-shaped locket necklace in sterling silver; likely similar, though 'tilted' shape may slightly differ silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gold Heart Necklace Locket with Photos
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Heart-shaped gold photo locket necklace aligns strongly with reference product's key features and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zales 10K Gold Engravable Photo Rope Frame Pendant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Engravable photo pendant with rope frame; different shape and likely no charm function lowers relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Things Remembered Silver Beaded Oval Locket Ornament
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Oval shaped locket ornament (likely a keepsake rather than necklace/charm) less relevant in usage and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Sterling Silver Photo Heart Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Heart-shaped personalized photo necklace in sterling silver similar to referenceâ€™s personalization and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tiny Poppy Heart Photo Locket Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Small heart photo locket necklace closely matches shape, function, and style of reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Forget Me Not Heart Photo Locket Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Heart photo locket necklace strongly aligned with key features and use of reference product.
Heart photo locket in precious metal similar in shape and construction to reference product.
Personalized photo pendant with birthstone but shape unspecified and may not be a heart or locket style.
Heart locket necklace likely similar in shape and function, though style is vintage versus contemporary.
Photo charm necklace with rectangle shape differs in silhouette but is still a photo charm accessory.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Floral Heart Locket Necklace in Yellow Gold
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Heart-shaped locket necklace in gold with floral design similar in core structure and personalization.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Silver Cubic Zirconia Floral Heart Photo Locket Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sterling silver floral heart photo locket necklace closely matches reference product features and function.
